metadata.Title: CVE-2020-21533 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
fig2dev 3.2.7b contains a stack buffer overflow in the read_textobject function in read.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-21533` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

fig2dev - 1:3.2.6a-6ubuntu1.1
transfig - 1:3.2.6a-6ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fig2dev package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.2.6a-6ubuntu1.1').
